adjectives.description: laggardly (comparative more laggardly, superlative most laggardly)

entries.meaning: Slow in manner; taking more time than is necessary; lagging behind.
examples: For the most part the early adopters, early majority, and later majority can function in either an innovative system, laggardly system, or a system that has a combination of both.

adverbs.description: laggardly (comparative more laggardly, superlative most laggardly)

entries.meaning: In the manner of a laggard; sluggishly; slowly.
